oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Das regionale Standbein stärken – Ergebnisse einer Institutionenanalyse der Bio-Branche in Ostdeutschland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nölting, Benjamin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The organic sector in East Germany is a latecomer. An institutional analysis shows specific pathways and restrictions for its further development: The East German or-ganic sector is integrated in national and international markets but it is linked only weakly with the regional context. Consequently, regional networks are a chance to develop the regional market and broaden its social basis as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nölting, Benjamin (2007) Das regionale Standbein stärken – Ergebnisse einer Institutionenanalyse der Bio-Branche in Ostdeutschland. [Strengthening the Regional Links – Results of an Institutional Analysis of the Organic Agriculture and Food Sector in East Germany.] Paper at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
